##### FILE: external_dns2_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/external-dns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: external-dns
  name: external-dns
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=service
        - --source=ingress
        - --domain-filter=${domain}
        - --provider=aws
        - --aws-zone-type=private
        - --registry=txt
        - --txt-owner-id=${hosted_zone_id}
        env:
        - name: AWS_DEFAULT_REGION
          value: ${REGION}
        image: k8s.gcr.io/external-dns/external-dns:v0.11.0
        name: external-dns
      serviceAccountName: external-dns

---

kind: Job

  name: extreme-stress
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 30
  parallelism: 30
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        job: extreme-stress
      name: stress-ng-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apt-get update && apt-get install -y stress-ng && stress-ng --cpu 1 --timeout
          60s --metrics-brief
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: ubuntu:latest
        name: stress-ng-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
      nodeName: kind-worker
      restartPolicy: Never

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/demo-failed-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: demo-failed-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 2
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 3
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - python
        - -c
        - |
          import os
          pod_index = int(os.environ.get("JOB_COMPLETION_INDEX", -1))
          print("Pod Index:", pod_index)
          print(1 / pod_index)
        image: python:3.8-slim
        name: demo-failed-job
      restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: failover-assistant.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynamic_parameters/Deployment/hwameistor-failover-assistant:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: hwameistor-failover-assistant
  name: hwameistor-failover-assistant
  namespace: dynamic_parameters
spec:
  replicas: dynamic_parameters
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hwameistor-failover-assistant
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hwameistor-failover-assistant
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: dynamic_parameters/dynamic_parameters:dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: failover-assistant
        resources: null
      serviceAccountName: hwameistor-admin

---

##### FILE: fake-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fake-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fake-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5000
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fake-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fake-pod
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: In
                values:
                - kwok
      containers:
      - image: fake-image
        name: fake-container
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kwok.x-k8s.io/node
        operator: Exists

---

data:
  filters.conf: |
    [FILTER]
        Name     parser
        Match    *
        Key_name log
        Parser   crio
  flb_log_cw: "false"
  output.conf: "[OUTPUT]\n    Name cloudwatch_logs\n    Match   *\n    region ap-northeast-2\n
    \   log_group_name <CloudWatch_Log_Group_Name>\n    log_stream_prefix from-fluent-bit-\n
    \   auto_create_group true\n    log_key log\n    \n"
  parsers.conf: |
    [PARSER]
        Name crio
        Format Regex
        Regex ^(?<time>[^ ]+) (?<stream>stdout|stderr) (?<logtag>P|F) (?<log>(?:(?!healthcheck).)*)$
        Time_Key    time
        Time_Format %!Y(MISSING)-%!m(MISSING)-%!d(MISSING)T%!H(MISSING):%!M(MISSING):%!S(MISSING).%!L(MISSING)%!z(MISSING)
kind: ConfigMap

##### FILE: fastapi12_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to store-config/Deployment/fastapi-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fastapi-deployment
  namespace: store-config
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fastapi-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fastapi-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - poetry run store
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: fastapi-secret
        image: store
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

---

          requests:

##### FILE: fastapi8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to standard/Deployment/fastapi:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: fastapi
    name: fastapi
  name: fastapi
  namespace: standard
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fastapi

    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fastapi
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: johndoe/kube-fastapi
        name: fastapi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

##### FILE: fastapi-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to grocery-ocr-api/Deployment/fastapi-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fastapi-deployment
  namespace: grocery-ocr-api
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fastapi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fastapi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: postgresql_url
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: url
              name: fastapi-secret
        image: grocery-ocr-api:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: fastapi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

---

            memory: 256Mi

      - name: regcred

##### FILE: fastapi-deployment3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fastapi:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: fastapi
  name: fastapi
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: fastapi
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/kubernates-quarkus-example-project-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: fastapi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          value: mongodb://root:example@mongo:27017/quarkus-database
        - name: PERSON_SERVICE_URL
          value: http://quarkus:8080
        image: ghcr.io/woraamy/kubernates-quarkus-example-project/fastapi
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: fastapi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
          hostPort: 5000
          protocol: TCP
      restartPolicy: Always

---

            memory: 64Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/fastapi-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-k8s
  name: fastapi-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: traefik
  rules:
  - host: www.cynomart.site
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: fastapi
            port:
              number: 5000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - www.cynomart.site
    secretName: letsencrypt-secret

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: fastapi
  name: fastapi-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fastapi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fastapi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ENV
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: ENV
              name: app-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_HOST
              name: app-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: app-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: app-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_SECRET

##### FILE: fastapi-server.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to vovcha/Deployment/fastapi-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: fastapi
  name: fastapi-deployment
  namespace: vovcha
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fastapi
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: fastapi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: UVICORN_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: uvicorn_port_listen
              name: webapp-conf
        - name: DEFAULT_RESPONSE_MESSAGE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: default_response_message
              name: webapp-conf
        - name: REDIS_DEFAULT_USER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: redis_default_user_password
              name: webapp-conf
        image: fastapi-server:v1
        name: fastapi-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/fastapi-cache
          name: cache-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          sizeLimit: 100Mi
        name: cache-volume

---

            memory: 400Mi
      nodeSelector:

kind: Ingress
metadata:

    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  name: fastcampus-http
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: svc.fastcampus.k8s
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: svc-page
            port:
              number: 5678
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: cloud.fastcampus.k8s
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: cloud-page
            port:
              number: 5678
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: fdb-operator_templates_manager_statefulset_8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: controller-manager
    controller-tools.k8s.io: "1.0"
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
      controller-tools.k8s.io: "1.0"
  serviceName: controller-manager-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
        controller-tools.k8s.io: "1.0"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: SECRET_NAME
          value: fdb-kubernetes-operator-secrets
        - name: DISABLE_SIDECAR_TLS_CHECK
          value: "1"
        - name: FDB_TLS_CERTIFICATE_FILE
          value: /tmp/fdb-certs/cert.pem
        - name: FDB_TLS_CA_FILE
          value: /tmp/fdb-certs/cert.pem
        - name: FDB_TLS_KEY_FILE
          value: /tmp/fdb-certs/key.pem
        image: kanisterio/fdb-kubernetes-operator:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9876
          name: webhook-server
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/cert
          name: cert
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /tmp/fdb-certs
          name: fdb-certs
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: default
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: webhook-server-secret
      - name: fdb-certs
        secret:
          secretName: fdb-kubernetes-operator-secrets

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/controller-manager
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/StatefulSet/controller-manager failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

##### FILE: fe-deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to pharmacy-app/Deployment/front-end:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    component: front-end
  name: front-end
  namespace: pharmacy-app
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: front-end
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        component: front-end
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: datnd2711/pharmacy-fe:v5
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http-frontend
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: front-end
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-frontend
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http-frontend
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: my-dockerhub-secret

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource pharmacy-app/Deployment/front-end failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource pharmacy-app/Deployment/front-end failed:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/selmag-feedback-service-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: selmag-feedback-service
  name: selmag-feedback-service-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: selmag-feedback-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: selmag-feedback-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --spring.config.import=/etc/opt/feedback-service/application-k8s.yml
        env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: k8s
        - name: LOKI
          value: http://loki-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:3100
        image: 192.168.49.1:5000/selmag/feedback-service:0.0.1
        name: selmag-feedback-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/opt/feedback-service
          name: service-config
      - args:
        - -promscrape.config=/etc/opt/vmagent/promscrape.yaml
        - -remoteWrite.url=http://vm-svc.selmag.svc.cluster.local:8428/api/v1/write
        - -remoteWrite.label=instance=$(NODE_NAME)
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: victoriametrics/vmagent:v1.93.12
        name: vmagent
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/opt/vmagent
          name: vmconfig
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: feedback-vmagent-cm
        name: vmconfig
      - configMap:
          name: feedback-service-config
        name: service-config

##### FILE: feedservice-db-deployment.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/feedservice-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -o ./kubernetes/
    kompose.service.type: loadbalancer
    kompose.version: 1.34.0 (cbf2835db)
    org.springframework.boot.ignore: "true"
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: feedservice-db
  name: feedservice-db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: feedservice-db
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -o ./kubernetes/
        kompose.service.type: loadbalancer
        kompose.version: 1.34.0 (cbf2835db)
        org.springframework.boot.ignore: "true"
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: feedservice-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - max_connections=200
        env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: feeddatabase
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: mypassword
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: myuser
        image: postgres:16
        name: feedservice-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          protocol: TCP
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: feedservice-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/feedservice:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -o ./kubernetes/
    kompose.hpa.cpu: "70"
    kompose.hpa.memory: "70"
    kompose.hpa.replicas.max: "12"
    kompose.hpa.replicas.min: "2"
    kompose.image-pull-policy: Always
    kompose.service.healthcheck.liveness.http_get_path: /actuator/health/liveness
    kompose.service.healthcheck.liveness.http_get_port: "8085"
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.http_get_path: /actuator/health/readiness
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.http_get_port: "8085"
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.retries: "3"
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.start_period: 8s
    kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.timeout: 5s
    kompose.version: 1.34.0 (cbf2835db)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: feedservice
  name: feedservice
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: feedservice
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -o ./kubernetes/
        kompose.hpa.cpu: "70"
        kompose.hpa.memory: "70"
        kompose.hpa.replicas.max: "12"
        kompose.hpa.replicas.min: "2"
        kompose.image-pull-policy: Always
        kompose.service.healthcheck.liveness.http_get_path: /actuator/health/liveness
        kompose.service.healthcheck.liveness.http_get_port: "8085"
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.http_get_path: /actuator/health/readiness
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.http_get_port: "8085"
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.retries: "3"
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.start_period: 8s
        kompose.service.healthcheck.readiness.timeout: 5s
        kompose.version: 1.34.0 (cbf2835db)
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: feedservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: EUREKA_URI
          value: http://servicediscovery:8761/eureka
        - name: JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS
          value: -XX:ActiveProcessorCount=4 -XX:MaxDirectMemorySize=100M
        - name: POSTGRES_URI
          value: jdbc:postgresql://feedservice-db:5436/
        - name: RABBITMQ_HOST
          value: rabbitmq
        - name: REDIS_URI
          value: redis
        - name: ZIPKIN_URI
          value: http://zipkin:9411/
        image: ghcr.io/tobias-pe/distributed-systems-energy-efficiency/feedservice:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8085
          initialDelaySeconds: 8
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: feedservice
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8085
          initialDelaySeconds: 8
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: "1258291200"
          requests:
            cpu: 550m
            memory: "1258291200"
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: feedservice
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 12
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 70
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageUtilization: 70
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 2
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: feedservice

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/ferretdb-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: ferretdb-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ferretdb-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ferretdb-operator
  name: ferretdb-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - ferretdb.ferretdb.com
  resources:
  - ferretdbs
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - ferretdb.ferretdb.com
  resources:
  - ferretdbs/status
  verbs:
  - get

##### FILE: fertiscan-backend-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fertiscan-backend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fertiscan-backend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fertiscan-backend
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        instrumentation.opentelemetry.io/inject-python: "true"
      labels:
        app: fertiscan-backend
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT
          value: http://alloy.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:4318
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_INSECURE
          value: "true"
        - name: OTEL_METRICS_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: OTEL_LOGS_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: OTEL_PYTHON_LOG_CORRELATION
          value: "true"
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER
          value: always_on
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER_ARG
          value: "1"
        - name: OTEL_PYTHON_LOGGING_AUTO_INSTRUMENTATION_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: OTEL_INSTRUMENTATION_HTTP_CAPTURE_HEADERS_SERVER_REQUEST
          value: .*
        - name: OTEL_INSTRUMENTATION_HTTP_CAPTURE_HEADERS_SERVER_RESPONSE
          value: .*
        - name: OTEL_PYTHON_FASTAPI_EXCLUDED_URLS
          value: health
        - name: OTEL_SERVICE_NAME
          value: fertiscan-backend
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: fertiscan-backend-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/fertiscan-backend:200-as-a-developer-i-would-like-to-test-instrumentation-with-local-environment-setup
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: fertiscan-backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cachedir_joblib
          name: tmp
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

---

##### FILE: fertiscan-backend-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fertiscan-backend-preview:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fertiscan-backend-preview
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fertiscan-backend-preview
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        instrumentation.opentelemetry.io/inject-python: "true"
      labels:
        app: fertiscan-backend-preview
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT
          value: http://alloy.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:4318
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: OTEL_METRICS_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: OTEL_PYTHON_LOG_CORRELATION
          value: "true"
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER
          value: always_on
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER_ARG
          value: "1"
        - name: OTEL_LOGS_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: API_BASE_PATH
          value: /api
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: fertiscan-backend-preview-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/fertiscan-backend:248
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: fertiscan-backend-preview
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cachedir_joblib
          name: tmp
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp
      - name: logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: fertiscan-preview-logs-pvc
      - name: uploads
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: fertiscan-preview-uploads-pvc

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fertiscan-backend-preview
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fertiscan-backend-preview
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        instrumentation.opentelemetry.io/inject-python: "true"
      labels:
        app: fertiscan-backend-preview
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT
          value: http://alloy.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:4318
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: OTEL_METRICS_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: OTEL_PYTHON_LOG_CORRELATION
          value: "true"
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER
          value: always_on
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER_ARG
          value: "1"
        - name: OTEL_LOGS_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: API_BASE_PATH
          value: /api
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: fertiscan-backend-preview-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/fertiscan-backend:248
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: fertiscan-backend-preview
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cachedir_joblib
          name: tmp
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp
      - name: logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: fertiscan-preview-logs-pvc
      - name: uploads
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: fertiscan-preview-uploads-pvc

---

##### FILE: fertiscan-frontend-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fertiscan-frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fertiscan-frontend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fertiscan-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fertiscan-frontend
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - fertiscan-frontend
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: fertiscan-frontend-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/fertiscan-frontend:304-adapt-alpha-v100-to-fastapi-backend-and-minor-fixes
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: fertiscan-frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsGroup: 3000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fertiscan-frontend-preview:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fertiscan-frontend-preview
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fertiscan-frontend-preview
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fertiscan-frontend-preview
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - fertiscan-frontend-preview
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_DEBUG
          value: "true"
        - name: BACKEND_URL
          value: https://fertiscan-preview.inspection.alpha.canada.ca/api
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/fertiscan-frontend:479
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: fertiscan-frontend-preview
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsGroup: 3000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000

        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: fertiscan-frontend-preview
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsGroup: 3000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000

---

    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/client_max_body_size: 200m
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "120"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range: 205.194.32.0/24,10.244.0.0/16,192.197.71.0/24

  rules:

            port:
              number: 5000
        path: /api(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
  tls:

    - fertiscan.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    secretName: aciacfia-tls

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: open-feature-fib-service
  name: open-feature-fib-service
  namespace: open-feature-demo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: open-feature-fib-service
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        openfeature.dev/enabled: "true"
        openfeature.dev/featureflagsource: end-to-end
      labels:
        app: open-feature-fib-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - flagd
        env:
        - name: HARNESS_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: harness-key
              name: vendor-keys
              optional: true
        - name: LD_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ld-key
              name: vendor-keys
              optional: true
        - name: SPLIT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: split-key
              name: vendor-keys
              optional: true
        - name: CLOUDBEES_APP_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: cloudbees-key
              name: vendor-keys
              optional: true
        - name: FLAGSMITH_ENV_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: flagsmith-key
              name: vendor-keys
              optional: true
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: open-feature-fib-service-config
        image: ghcr.io/open-feature/playground-fib-service:v0.16.0
        name: fib-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 30001

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kube-fieldforge
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: fieldforge-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-fieldforge
  name: fieldforge-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - fieldforge.puiterwijk.org
  resources:
  - fieldforges
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - fieldforge.puiterwijk.org
  resources:
  - fieldforges/status
  verbs:
  - get

##### FILE: fieldref.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/dapi-envars:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: dapi-envars
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - while true; do echo -en '\n'; printenv MY_NODE_NAME MY_POD_NAME MY_POD_NAMESPACE;
      printenv MY_POD_IP MY_POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT; sleep 10; done;
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    env:
    - name: MY_NODE_NAME
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: spec.nodeName
    - name: MY_POD_NAME
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.name
    - name: MY_POD_NAMESPACE
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.namespace
    - name: MY_POD_IP
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: status.podIP
    image: registry.k8s.io/busybox
    name: test-container
  restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: fight_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/fight-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubemon
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: fight-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubemon
  name: fight-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - kubemon.memetoasty.github.com
  resources:
  - fights
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - kubemon.memetoasty.github.com
  resources:
  - fights/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: file12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/samplepod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: samplepod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: c1
    readinessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - cat
        - /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
      failureThreshold: 2
      initialDelaySeconds: 50
      periodSeconds: 10

---

  name: counter
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:

    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - 'i=0; while true; do echo "$i: $(date)";i=$((i+1));sleep 1;done'

    name: count

##### FILE: filebeat_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: |-
    filebeat.config:
      prospectors:
        # Mounted `filebeat-prospectors` configmap:
        path: ${path.config}/prospectors.d/*.yml
        # Reload prospectors configs as they change:
        reload.enabled: false
      modules:
        path: ${path.config}/modules.d/*.yml
        # Reload module configs as they change:
        reload.enabled: false
    output.logstash:
      hosts: ['logstash-service:5044']
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: kube-system

---

##### FILE: filebeat_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/filebeat-prospectors:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  kubernetes.yml: |-
    - type: docker
      containers.ids:
      - "*"
      processors:
        - add_kubernetes_metadata:
            in_cluster: true
        - drop_event.when:
            or:
            - equals:
                kubernetes.namespace: "kube-system"
            - equals:
                kubernetes.namespace: "kube-node-lease"
            - equals:
                kubernetes.namespace: "kube-public"
            - equals:
                kubernetes.namespace: "kafka"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat-prospectors
  namespace: kube-system

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: filebeat_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:6.8.4
        name: filebeat
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/prospectors.d
          name: prospectors
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-prospectors
        name: prospectors
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: |-
    filebeat.config:
      prospectors:
        # Mounted `filebeat-prospectors` configmap:
        path: ${path.config}/prospectors.d/*.yml
        # Reload prospectors configs as they change:
        reload.enabled: false
      modules:
        path: ${path.config}/modules.d/*.yml
        # Reload module configs as they change:
        reload.enabled: false
    processors:
      - add_cloud_metadata:

    cloud.id: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID}
    cloud.auth: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH}

    output.logstash:
      hosts: ['logstash-service:5044']
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: kube-system

##### FILE: filebeat2_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
  name: filebeat
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elasticsearch-logging
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          value: changeme
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID
          value: null
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH
          value: null
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:6.3.0
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/prospectors.d
          name: prospectors
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-prospectors
        name: prospectors
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---

          subPath: my-file.log

          name: filebeat-configmap
        name: filebeat-config
      - configMap:
          name: my-filebeat
        name: my-filebeat

        reload.enabled: false
      modules:
        path: ${path.config}/modules.d/*.yml
        # Reload module configs as they change:
        reload.enabled: false
    output.logstash:
      hosts: ['logstash-service:5044']
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: kube-system

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: filebeat-agent_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:6.8.4
        name: filebeat
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/prospectors.d
          name: prospectors
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-prospectors
        name: prospectors
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: |-
    filebeat.config:
      prospectors:
        # Mounted `filebeat-prospectors` configmap:
        path: ${path.config}/prospectors.d/*.yml
        # Reload prospectors configs as they change:
        reload.enabled: false
      modules:
        path: ${path.config}/modules.d/*.yml
        # Reload module configs as they change:
        reload.enabled: false
    processors:
      - add_cloud_metadata:

    cloud.id: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID}
    cloud.auth: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH}

    output.logstash:
      hosts: ['logstash-service:5044']

    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
  name: filebeat-config

##### FILE: filebeat-ds_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
  name: filebeat
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elasticsearch-logging
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          value: changeme
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID
          value: null
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH
          value: null
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:6.3.0
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/prospectors.d
          name: prospectors
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-prospectors
        name: prospectors
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: |-
    filebeat.config:
      prospectors:
        # Mounted `filebeat-prospectors` configmap:
        path: ${path.config}/prospectors.d/*.yml
        # Reload prospectors configs as they change:
        reload.enabled: false
      modules:
        path: ${path.config}/modules.d/*.yml
        # Reload module configs as they change:
        reload.enabled: false
    processors:
      - add_cloud_metadata:

    cloud.id: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID}
    cloud.auth: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH}

    output.logstash:
      hosts: ['logstash-service:5044']
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: kube-system

##### FILE: filebeat-ds2_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
  name: filebeat
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elasticsearch-logging
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          value: changeme
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID
          value: null
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH
          value: null
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:6.3.0
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/prospectors.d
          name: prospectors
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-prospectors
        name: prospectors
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat failed:

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
  name: filebeat
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elasticsearch-logging
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          value: changeme
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID
          value: null
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH
          value: null
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:6.3.0
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/prospectors.d
          name: prospectors
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-prospectors
        name: prospectors
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

##### FILE: filebeat-kubernetes_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elastic/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: "filebeat.inputs:\n- type: container\n  paths:\n    - /var/log/containers/*.log\n
    \ processors:\n    - add_kubernetes_metadata:\n        host: ${NODE_NAME}\n        matchers:\n
    \       - logs_path:\n            logs_path: \"/var/log/containers/\"\n\n# To
    enable hints based autodiscover, remove `filebeat.inputs` configuration and uncomment
    this:\n#filebeat.autodiscover:\n#  providers:\n#    - type: kubernetes\n#      node:
    ${NODE_NAME}\n#      hints.enabled: true\n#      hints.default_config:\n#        type:
    container\n#        paths:\n#          - /var/log/containers/*${data.kubernetes.container.id}.log\n\nprocessors:\n
    \ - add_cloud_metadata:\n  - add_host_metadata:\n\ncloud.id: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID}\ncloud.auth:
    ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH}\n\noutput.elasticsearch:\n  hosts: ['${ELASTICSEARCH_HOST:elasticsearch}:${ELASTICSEARCH_PORT:9200}']\n
    \ username: ${ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME}\n  password: ${ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD}\n
    \ \n  ## ADD THESE TWO LINES IF FILEBEAT AGENTS FAIL TO SEND LOGS TO THE CLUSTER
    ##\n  protocol: \"https\"\n  ssl.verification_mode: none\n\n  ## CUSTOM INDEX
    PATTERN\n  index: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod-%!{(MISSING)[agent.version]}\"\n\nsetup.template:\n
    \ name: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod\"\n  pattern: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod-%!{(MISSING)[agent.version]}\"\n\n\n#
    output.elasticsearch:\n#   hosts: ['${ELASTICSEARCH_HOST:elasticsearch}:${ELASTICSEARCH_PORT:9200}']\n#
    \  username: ${ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME}\n#   password: ${ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD}\n\n#
    \  ## ADD THESE TWO LINES IF FILEBEAT AGENTS FAIL TO SEND LOGS TO THE CLUSTER
    ##\n#   protocol: \"https\"\n#   ssl.verification_mode: none\n\n#   ## CUSTOM
    INDEX PATTERN\n#   index: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod-%!{(MISSING)[agent.version]}\"\n\n#
    setup.template:\n#   name: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod\"\n#   pattern: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod-%!{(MISSING)[agent.version]}\""
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: elastic

---

##### FILE: filebeat-kubernetes_8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elastic/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat
  namespace: elastic
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elastic-cluster-es-http.elastic.SVC
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic
              name: elastic-cluster-es-elastic-user
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID
          value: null
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH
          value: null
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:8.6.2
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 416
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/filebeat-data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elastic/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat
  namespace: elastic
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elastic-cluster-es-http.elastic.SVC
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic
              name: elastic-cluster-es-elastic-user
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID
          value: null
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH
          value: null
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:8.6.2
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 416
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/filebeat-data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: data

##### FILE: filebeat-kubernetes2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: |-
    filebeat.autodiscover:
      providers:
        - type: kubernetes
          node: ${NODE_NAME}
          hints.enabled: true
          hints.default_config.enabled: false
          hints.default_config:
            type: container
            paths:
              - /var/log/containers/*${data.kubernetes.container.id}.log
            processors:
                - decode_json_fields:
                      fields: ["message"]
                      target: ""
                      overwrite_keys: true
    processors:
      - add_cloud_metadata:
      - add_host_metadata:

    cloud.id: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID}
    cloud.auth: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH}

    output.elasticsearch:
      hosts: ['${ELASTICSEARCH_HOST:elasticsearch}:${ELASTICSEARCH_PORT:9200}']
      username: ${ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME}
      password: ${ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD}
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: filebeat-kubernetes3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: |-
    filebeat.autodiscover:
      providers:
        - type: kubernetes
          node: ${NODE_NAME}
          templates:
            -   condition:
                  contains:
                    kubernetes.container.labels.collect_logs_with_filebeat: "true"
                config:
                  -   type: container
                      paths:
                        - "/var/log/containers/*-${data.kubernetes.container.id}.log"
                      json.keys_under_root: true
                      json.add_error_key: true
                      json.message_key: message
    processors:
      - add_cloud_metadata:
      - add_host_metadata:

    cloud.id: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID}
    cloud.auth: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH}

    output.elasticsearch:
      hosts: ['${ELASTICSEARCH_HOST:elasticsearch}:${ELASTICSEARCH_PORT:9200}']
      username: ${ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME}
      password: ${ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD}
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: kube-system

---

            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 416
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/filebeat-data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: data

---

##### FILE: filebeat-kubernetes4_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: "filebeat.inputs:\n- type: container\n  paths:\n    - /var/log/containers/*.log\n
    \ processors:\n    - add_kubernetes_metadata:\n        host: ${NODE_NAME}\n        matchers:\n
    \       - logs_path:\n            logs_path: \"/var/log/containers/\"\n\n# To
    enable hints based autodiscover, remove `filebeat.inputs` configuration and uncomment
    this:\n#filebeat.autodiscover:\n#  providers:\n#    - type: kubernetes\n#      node:
    ${NODE_NAME}\n#      hints.enabled: true\n#      hints.default_config:\n#        type:
    container\n#        paths:\n#          - /var/log/containers/*${data.kubernetes.container.id}.log\n\nprocessors:\n
    \ - add_cloud_metadata:\n  - add_host_metadata:\n\ncloud.id: ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID}\ncloud.auth:
    ${ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH}\n\noutput.elasticsearch:\n  hosts: ['${ELASTICSEARCH_HOST:elasticsearch}:${ELASTICSEARCH_PORT:9200}']\n
    \ username: ${ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME}\n  password: ${ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD}\n
    \ \n  ## ADD THESE TWO LINES IF FILEBEAT AGENTS FAIL TO SEND LOGS TO THE CLUSTER
    ##\n  protocol: \"https\"\n  ssl.verification_mode: none\n\n  ## CUSTOM INDEX
    PATTERN\n  index: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod-%!{(MISSING)[agent.version]}\"\n\nsetup.template:\n
    \ name: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod\"\n  pattern: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod-%!{(MISSING)[agent.version]}\"\n\n\n#
    output.elasticsearch:\n#   hosts: ['${ELASTICSEARCH_HOST:elasticsearch}:${ELASTICSEARCH_PORT:9200}']\n#
    \  username: ${ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME}\n#   password: ${ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD}\n\n#
    \  ## ADD THESE TWO LINES IF FILEBEAT AGENTS FAIL TO SEND LOGS TO THE CLUSTER
    ##\n#   protocol: \"https\"\n#   ssl.verification_mode: none\n\n#   ## CUSTOM
    INDEX PATTERN\n#   index: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod-%!{(MISSING)[agent.version]}\"\n\n#
    setup.template:\n#   name: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod\"\n#   pattern: \"filebeat-aks-devops-prod-%!{(MISSING)[agent.version]}\""
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: kube-system

##### FILE: filebeat-kubernetes4_8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elastic-cluster-es-http.elastic.SVC
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          value: tC6p5O19C8hzjf1BN5c348rZ
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID
          value: null
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH
          value: null
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:8.6.2
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 416
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/filebeat-data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elastic/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat
  namespace: elastic
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elastic-cluster-es-http.elastic.SVC
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic
              name: elastic-cluster-es-elastic-user
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_ID
          value: null
        - name: ELASTIC_CLOUD_AUTH
          value: null
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:8.6.2
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 416
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/filebeat-data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate

##### FILE: filebeat-logstash.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elastic/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: |-
    # To enable hints based autodiscover, remove `filebeat.inputs` configuration and uncomment this:
    filebeat.autodiscover:
      providers:
        - type: kubernetes
          node: ${NODE_NAME}
          hints.enabled: true
          hints.default_config:
            type: container
            paths:
              - /var/log/containers/*${data.kubernetes.container.id}.log
    processors:
      - add_cloud_metadata:
      - add_host_metadata:

    output.logstash:
      hosts: '${LOGSTASH_URL}'
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: elastic

---

##### FILE: filebeat-logstash_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elastic/DaemonSet/filebeat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: filebeat
  name: filebeat
  namespace: elastic
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: filebeat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: filebeat
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - /etc/filebeat.yml
        - -e
        env:
        - name: LOGSTASH_URL
          value: logstash-service:5044
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:7.11.0
        name: filebeat
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/filebeat.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: filebeat.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      serviceAccountName: filebeat
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 384
          name: filebeat-config
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/filebeat-data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: data

---

    - sleep

    name: busybox

      name: volumes-file-or-create-dir
    - mountPath: /var/local/aaa/1.txt
      name: volumes-file-or-create-file

  - hostPath:
      path: /var/local/aaa
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: volumes-file-or-create-dir

      path: /var/local/aaa/1.txt
      type: FileOrCreate
    name: volumes-file-or-create-file

##### FILE: fileserver-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fileserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: fileserver
  name: fileserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: fileserver
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/fileserver-default: "true"
        io.kompose.service: fileserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BASEPATH
          value: /
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD
          value: super_secret_password
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_REALM
          value: admin
        - name: BASIC_AUTH_USER
          value: admin
        image: peterberweiler/fileserver
        name: fileserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /public
          name: fileserver-public
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: fileserver-public
        nfs:
          path: /volume1/Plex
          readOnly: false
          server: 192.168.1.155

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/fileserver:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: fileserver
  name: fileserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: "80"
    port: 80
