policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/fileupload-service-hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: fileupload-service-hpa
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 5
        type: Percent
        value: 100
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 10
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 2
        type: Percent
        value: 100
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 0
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 20
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: fileupload-service

    spec:
      containers:

          value: "4443"
        - name: DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME
          value: USER
        - name: DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD
          value: PASS
        - name: DOCKER_MTU
          value: "1500"
        image: kasmdocker/kasm-public:public
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: kasm-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        - containerPort: 4443
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt
          name: kasm-data
          subPath: kasm-opt-data
      volumes:
      - name: kasm-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: kasm-pvc

##### FILE: finance-api-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/finance-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: finance-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: finance-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: finance-api
      name: finance-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: app-finance-configmap
        image: pablohhnunes/finance_api:1.1.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8085
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: finance-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8085
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /health/database
            port: 8085
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m

---

  name: finance-api-hpa
  namespace: default

  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 50
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1

    name: finance-api-deployment

##### FILE: finance-db-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/finance-db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: finance-db-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: finance-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: finance-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: db-finance-configmap
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgresql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - pg_isready
            - -U
            - postgres
            - -d
            - finance-db
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: db-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: local-storage

---

##### FILE: finance-db-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/finance-db-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: finance-db-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: finance-db
  serviceName: finance-api-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: finance-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: db-finance-configmap
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgresql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - pg_isready
            - -U
            - postgres
            - -d
            - finance-db
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-data
      volumes:
      - name: db-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: local-storage

---

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/finance:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: finance
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/fintech-app-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  name: fintech-app-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: fintech-service
            port:
              number: 5000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/kbench:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: kbench
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        kbench: fio
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MODE
          value: full
        - name: FILE_NAME
          value: /volume/test
        - name: SIZE
          value: 30G
        - name: CPU_IDLE_PROF
          value: disabled
        image: yasker/kbench:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: kbench
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: kbench

    openebs.io/nodeid: control-2

      path: /mnt/user/home-cluster-nfs

1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: fio-arm64.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/pod-fio-arm64:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: pod-fio-arm64
  namespace: default
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        nodeSelectorTerms:
        - matchExpressions:
          - key: kubernetes.io/arch
            operator: In
            values:
            - arm64
  containers:
  - command:
    - bash
    - -c
    - |
      echo "############# Setting up the tools #############"; apt update && apt install vim curl git jq apache2-utils -y; if [[ "${BUILD_OR_INSTALL}" =~ "build" ]]; then
        echo "############# Building fio from sources #############";
        echo "############# Installing tools needed to build fio #############";
        apt install make gcc g++ git libaio-dev libaio1 zlib1g-dev -y;
        echo "############# Cloning fio sources #############";
        cd; git clone https://github.com/axboe/fio.git;
        echo "############# Building fio #############";
        cd fio/; ./configure --build-static && make && make install;
      elif [[ "${BUILD_OR_INSTALL}" =~ "install" ]]; then
        echo "############# Installing fio #############";
        apt install fio -y;
      else
        echo "ERROR: BUILD_OR_INSTALL: ${BUILD_OR_INSTALL} not supported";
        exit 1;
      fi; echo "############# Uname -a #############"; uname -a; echo "############# Testing fio is working (fio --version) #############"; fio --version; if [[ "${BUILD_OR_INSTALL}" =~ "build" ]]; then
        echo "############# Command top copy it to your machine #############";
        echo "kubectl cp -n $(cat /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace) ${HOSTNAME}:/usr/local/bin/fio ./fio-linux-arm64";
      fi; echo "############# Done. Sleeping for a day #############"; sleep 1d
    env:
    - name: BUILD_OR_INSTALL
      value: build
    image: ubuntu:23.10
    name: ubuntu

---


Mutation:

kind: Pod

spec:

    nodeAffinity:

        - matchExpressions:

            operator: In
            values:
            - amd64
  containers:

      echo "############# Setting up the tools #############"; apt update && apt install vim curl git jq apache2-utils -y; if [[ "${BUILD_OR_INSTALL}" =~ "build" ]]; then
        echo "############# Building fio from sources #############";
        echo "############# Installing tools needed to build fio #############";
        apt install make gcc g++ git libaio-dev libaio1 zlib1g-dev -y;
        echo "############# Cloning fio sources #############";
        cd; git clone https://github.com/axboe/fio.git;
        echo "############# Building fio #############";
        cd fio/; ./configure --build-static && make && make install;
      elif [[ "${BUILD_OR_INSTALL}" =~ "install" ]]; then
        echo "############# Installing fio #############";
        apt install fio -y;
      else
        echo "ERROR: BUILD_OR_INSTALL: ${BUILD_OR_INSTALL} not supported";
        exit 1;
      fi; echo "############# Uname -a #############"; uname -a; echo "############# Testing fio is working (fio --version) #############"; fio --version; if [[ "${BUILD_OR_INSTALL}" =~ "build" ]]; then
        echo "############# Command top copy it to your machine #############";
        echo "kubectl cp -n $(cat /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace) ${HOSTNAME}:/usr/local/bin/fio ./fio-linux-x86_64";
      fi; echo "############# Done. Sleeping for a day #############"; sleep 1d

    - name: BUILD_OR_INSTALL
      value: build

##### FILE: firefox-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to selenium/Deployment/selenium-node-firefox:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: selenium-node-firefox
  name: selenium-node-firefox
  namespace: selenium
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: selenium-node-firefox
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: selenium-node-firefox
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SE_EVENT_BUS_HOST
          value: selenium-hub-svc
        - name: SE_EVENT_BUS_SUBSCRIBE_PORT
          value: "4443"
        - name: SE_EVENT_BUS_PUBLISH_PORT
          value: "4442"
        image: selenium/node-firefox:4.0
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - curl --request POST 'localhost:5555/se/grid/node/drain' --header 'X-REGISTRATION-SECRET;';
                tail --pid=$(pgrep -f '[n]ode --bind-host false --config /opt/selenium/config.toml')
                -f /dev/null; sleep 30s
        name: selenium-node-firefox
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5555
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: ".5"
            memory: 1000Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /dev/shm
          name: dshm
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 3600
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: dshm

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kraut
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: firewall-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kraut
  name: firewall-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - firewall.kraut.nicklasfrahm.dev
  resources:
  - firewalls
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - firewall.kraut.nicklasfrahm.dev
  resources:
  - firewalls/status
  verbs:
  - get

##### FILE: first1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "1"
  generation: 1
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        run: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-dep
  name: nginx-dep
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  revisionHistoryLimit: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-dep
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-dep
      name: nginx-dep
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.24-alpine
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx-dep
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: first-pod-volume.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/first-pod-volume:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: first-pod-volume
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx:latest
    name: nginx-container
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /volume-inside-container
      name: first-volume
  - image: jenkins/jenkins:alpine
    name: jenkins-container
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /volume-inside-container
      name: first-volume
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /Users/gabrielalopes/Dev/github/kubernetes/volume
      type: Directory
    name: first-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicaSet/udemy-k8s-aws-replicaset-webapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  name: udemy-k8s-aws-replicaset-webapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      label-app: rs-pod-webapp
      label-release: 0-5
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        label-app: rs-pod-webapp
        label-release: 0-5
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: richardchesterwood/k8s-fleetman-webapp-angular:release0-5
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: rs-pod-webapp
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: flags.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/FeatureFlag/app-flags:
apiVersion: core.openfeature.dev/v1beta1
batteryTargeting:
  if:
  - '>=':
    - var: batteryPercentage
    - 50
  - green
  - if:
    - '>=':
      - var: batteryPercentage
      - 25
    - yellow
    - if:
      - '>':
        - var: batteryPercentage
        - 0
      - red
      - grey
connectionTargeting:
  if:
  - ==:
    - var: connectionType
    - 4g
  - rocket
  - if:
    - ==:
      - var: connectionType
      - 3g
    - rabbit
    - if:
      - ==:
        - var: connectionType
        - 2g

##### FILE: flanel_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-flannel/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    k8s-app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds
  namespace: kube-flannel
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
      k8s-app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        k8s-app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: EVENT_QUEUE_DEPTH
          value: "5000"
        image: ghcr.io/flannel-io/flannel:v0.26.4
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
            - NET_RAW
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
        - mountPath: /run/xtables.lock
          name: xtables-lock
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /flannel
        - /opt/cni/bin/flannel
        command:
        - cp
        image: ghcr.io/flannel-io/flannel-cni-plugin:v1.6.2-flannel1
        name: install-cni-plugin
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/cni/bin
          name: cni-plugin
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: ghcr.io/flannel-io/flannel:v0.26.4
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/cni/bin
        name: cni-plugin
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/xtables.lock
          type: FileOrCreate
        name: xtables-lock

---

##### FILE: flannel1_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-amd64:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-amd64
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-amd64
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-amd64
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

---

##### FILE: flannel1_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-arm64:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-arm64
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm64
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm64
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm64
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

---

##### FILE: flannel1_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-arm:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-arm
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-ppc64le
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - ppc64le
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-ppc64le
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-ppc64le
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

apiVersion: v1
data:
  cni-conf.json: |
    {
      "name": "vxlan0",
      "cniVersion": "0.3.1",
      "plugins": [
        {
          "type": "flannel",
          "delegate": {
            "hairpinMode": true,
            "isDefaultGateway": true
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "portmap",
          "capabilities": {
            "portMappings": true
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  net-conf.json: |
    {
      "Network": "10.244.0.0/16",
      "Backend": {
        "Type": "vxlan",
        "VNI" : 4096,
        "Port": 4789
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-cfg
  namespace: kube-system

##### FILE: flannel3_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-arm64:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-arm64
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm64
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm64
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm64
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-arm64 failed:

##### FILE: flannel3_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-arm:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-arm
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-ppc64le:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-ppc64le
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - ppc64le
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-ppc64le
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-ppc64le
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

kind: DaemonSet

  namespace: kube-system

    matchLabels:
      app: flannel

        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel

        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:

              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - s390x
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:

          valueFrom:

            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false

          name: run

          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-s390x
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists

      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel

          path: /etc/cni/net.d

          name: kube-flannel-cfg

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/kube-flannel-cfg:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  cni-conf.json: |
    {
      "name": "vxlan0",
      "cniVersion": "0.3.1",
      "plugins": [
        {
          "type": "flannel",
          "delegate": {
            "hairpinMode": true,
            "isDefaultGateway": true
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "portmap",
          "capabilities": {
            "portMappings": true
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  net-conf.json: |
    {
      "Network": "10.244.0.0/16",
      "Backend": {
        "Type": "vxlan",
        "VNI" : 4096,
        "Port": 4789
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-cfg
  namespace: kube-system

##### FILE: flannel5_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-arm64:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-arm64
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm64
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm64
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm64
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

---

##### FILE: flannel5_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-arm:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-arm
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-ppc64le:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-ppc64le
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - ppc64le
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-ppc64le
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-ppc64le
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d

          name: kube-flannel-cfg

kind: ClusterRole

  name: flannel
  namespace: default

  - extensions
  resourceNames:
  - psp.flannel.unprivileged
  resources:
  - podsecuritypolicies
  verbs:
  - use
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - pods
  verbs:
  - get
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - nodes
  verbs:
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - nodes/status
  verbs:
  - patch

      "cniVersion": "0.3.1",
      "plugins": [
        {
          "type": "flannel",
          "delegate": {
            "hairpinMode": true,
            "isDefaultGateway": true
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "portmap",
          "capabilities": {
            "portMappings": true
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  net-conf.json: |
    {
      "Network": "10.244.0.0/16",
      "Backend": {
        "Type": "vxlan"
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap

  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-cfg
  namespace: kube-system

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/qingfeng666/flannel:v0.13.0
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
            - NET_RAW
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: registry.cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/qingfeng666/flannel:v0.13.0
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/kube-flannel-cfg:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  cni-conf.json: |
    {
      "name": "vxlan0",
      "cniVersion": "0.3.1",
      "plugins": [
        {
          "type": "flannel",
          "delegate": {
            "hairpinMode": true,
            "isDefaultGateway": true
          }
        },
        {
          "type": "portmap",
          "capabilities": {
            "portMappings": true
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  net-conf.json: |
    {
      "Network": "10.244.0.0/16",
      "Backend": {
        "Type": "vxlan",
        "VNI" : 4096,
        "Port": 4789
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-cfg
  namespace: kube-system

##### FILE: flannel7_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-amd64:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-amd64
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-amd64
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-amd64
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-amd64
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-amd64 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-amd64 failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-amd64 failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-amd64 failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds-arm64:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
    tier: node
  name: kube-flannel-ds-arm64
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
        tier: node
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm64
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm64
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: quay.io/coreos/flannel:v0.12.0-arm64
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

          valueFrom:

##### FILE: flannel8_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-flannel/DaemonSet/kube-flannel-ds:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flannel
  name: kube-flannel-ds
  namespace: kube-flannel
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flannel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flannel
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ip-masq
        - --kube-subnet-mgr
        command:
        - /opt/bin/flanneld
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: EVENT_QUEUE_DEPTH
          value: "5000"
        image: 10.173.181.26/flannel/flannel:v0.25.1
        name: kube-flannel
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/flannel
          name: run
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -f
        - /etc/kube-flannel/cni-conf.json
        - /etc/cni/net.d/10-flannel.conflist
        command:
        - cp
        image: 10.173.181.26/flannel/flannel:v0.25.1
        name: install-cni
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d
          name: cni
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-flannel/
          name: flannel-cfg
      serviceAccountName: flannel
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/flannel
        name: run
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d
        name: cni
      - configMap:
          name: kube-flannel-cfg
        name: flannel-cfg

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-v2-tutorial:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    downscaler/uptime: Mon-Fri 07:00-19:00 US/Pacific
  labels:
    app: flask-v2
  name: flask-v2-tutorial
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-v2-tutorial
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-v2-tutorial
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: jhinds/flask-tutorial:0.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: flask-v2-tutorial
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

##### FILE: flask_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/assign2flask:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: assign2flask
  name: assign2flask
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: assign2flask
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: assign2flask
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: changpeng3336/assign2:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /about
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: assign2flask
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---

##### FILE: flask1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongo-service
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: karenwang97/as3-app:v5
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: flask4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongo-service
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: karenwang97/as3-app:v5
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: flask-app_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: daniel1426/cloud-starter:healthmonitor
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: flask-app2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: your-flask-app-image:tag
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
      topologySpreadConstraints:
      - labelSelector:
          matchLabels:
            app: flask-app
        maxSkew: 1
        topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
        whenUnsatisfiable: DoNotSchedule

---

##### FILE: flaskapp-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flaskapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flaskapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flaskapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flaskapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FLASKAPP_PORT
          value: "5000"
        - name: DATABASE_URI
          value: mysql+pymysql://root:$(MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD)@mysql:3306/recruit
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: mysql-secret
        image: yoniyonatab/recruit:1.0.7
        name: flaskapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---

##### FILE: flask-app-deployment1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: karmanya1804/todoapp:v2
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders: null
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10

---

  rules:
  - host: your.host.domain
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: flask-lb
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - your.host.domain

          periodSeconds: 60

        readinessProbe:

            path: /health
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 75
          periodSeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 10

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

  - image: dbgurum/py_flask:2.0
    name: flaskapp-container
    ports:
    - containerPort: 9000
      protocol: TCP
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      name: nginx-conf
    name: nginx-proxy-config

##### FILE: flask-autoscaling.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/flask-app-hpa-deployment:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: flask-app-hpa-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 5
    scaleUp:
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 1
  maxReplicas: 4
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 50
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: flask-app-deployment

---

##### FILE: flask-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FLASK_ENV
          value: development
        - name: FLASK_APP
          value: app.py
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongo
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: aourbro1/assignment3-v2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: flask-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongo-service
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: wdas/ccbd-flask-app:2.4.1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 2
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 2

---

##### FILE: flask-deployment10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flask-app
  name: app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          value: mysql-service
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: mysql-config
        image: rahulkumarpaswan/flask_app:1.3
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---

##### FILE: flask-deployment12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/todo-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: todo-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: todo-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: todo-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongodb-service
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        - name: PORT
          value: "8888"
        - name: FLASK_HOST
          value: 0.0.0.0
        image: hsapte99/todo_app-flask-app:v2
        name: flask-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
      livenessProbe:
        failureThreshold: 3
        httpGet:
          path: /health
          port: 8888
        initialDelaySeconds: 15
        periodSeconds: 5
        timeoutSeconds: 2
      readinessProbe:
        failureThreshold: 3
        httpGet:
          path: /health
          port: 8888
        initialDelaySeconds: 15
        periodSeconds: 5
        timeoutSeconds: 2

---

##### FILE: flask-deployment14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flask-app
  name: flask-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: nagp-secret
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_USERNAME
              name: nagp-secret
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_host
              name: nagp-config
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db_name
              name: nagp-config
        image: agarwaljaishree/nagp_flaskapp:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: flask-app-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            cpu: 250m

---

##### FILE: flask-deployment15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flask-app
  name: flask-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: common-secret
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USERNAME
              name: common-secret
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database_host
              name: common-config
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db_name
              name: common-config
        image: ketansomani/nagp_flask:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: flask-app-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 600m
          requests:
            cpu: 300m

        app: flaskr

      - env:

          value: mongodb-service
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: pass
        - name: FLASK_ENV
          value: production
        - name: GITHUB_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: token
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_REPO_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: repo_name
              name: github-secret
        - name: GITHUB_BRANCH_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: branch_name
              name: github-secret
        image: voxten/python-docker-web:latest
        name: flask
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

##### FILE: flask-deployment19.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flask
  name: flask
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - flask db upgrade --url postgresql://mudasir:12345@postgres-service:5432/demo_db
          && gunicorn --bind 0.0.0.0:4000 app:app
        image: my-flask-app
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: flask
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4000
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nslookup postgres-service; do echo waiting for postgres; sleep 2;
          done;
        image: busybox
        name: wait-for-postgres

---

##### FILE: flask-deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongo-service
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        image: wdas/ccbd-flask-app:2.4.1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 2
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 2

---
