##### FILE: flask-deployment7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongo-service
        image: td2478/todo-flask:v4
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: todo-flask
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

  name: flask-ingress

  rules:
  - host: localhost
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:

            name: my-flask-service
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: my-second-service
            port:
              number: 8081
        path: /second
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: postgresql
            port:
              number: 5432
        path: /database
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: flask-ingress1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/flask-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
  name: flask-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: nagp.flaskapp.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: flask-app-nodeport
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /v1(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific

---

  namespace: default

    name: todo-backend
    ports:
    - containerPort: 5000
  - env:

    name: mysql

      name: mysql-init-db-config

##### FILE: flask-redis-deployment-2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-redis:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-redis
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-redis
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-redis
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DEBUG
              name: flask-config
        - name: PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PORT
              name: flask-config
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_HOST
              name: flask-config
        - name: REDIS_PASSWORD
          value: SuperS3cret
        image: ghcr.io/badri/flask-redis:1.0
        name: flask
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---


Mutation:

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/flask-redis failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: flask-redis-private-image.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-redis-pvt:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-redis-pvt
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-redis
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-redis
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DEBUG
              name: flask-config
        - name: PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PORT
              name: flask-config
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_HOST
              name: flask-config
        - name: REDIS_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_PASSWORD
              name: redis-credentials
        image: ghcr.io/badri/flask-redis:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: flask
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: ghcr-creds

---

##### FILE: flask-redis-with-init.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-redis-init:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-redis-init
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-redis-init
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-redis-init
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DEBUG
              name: flask-config
        - name: PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PORT
              name: flask-config
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_HOST
              name: flask-config
        - name: REDIS_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_PASSWORD
              name: redis-credentials
        image: ghcr.io/badri/flask-redis:1.0
        name: flask
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - apk add --no-cache netcat-openbsd && /usr/local/bin/check-redis.sh
        env:
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: cache.full-stack.svc.cluster.local
        image: alpine
        name: check-redis
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/check-redis.sh
          name: redis-check-script
          subPath: check-redis.sh
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: redis-check
        name: redis-check-script

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: flask-server-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-server-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-server-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: my-secret
        - name: USER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: my-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: my-config-map
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_HOST
              name: my-config-map
        image: ancaco12/mock-server-flask:v6
        name: flask-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 256Mi

---

        app: flask
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONTAINER_API_URL
          value: http://sentiment-service:5000
        image: your-acr.azurecr.io/flaskweb:latest
        name: flask
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      nodeSelector:
        agentpool: pooler
